name: Narwal
0:
”Alexa，ask my robot to start cleaning”
”Alexa, ask my robot to stop cleaning”
”Alexa，ask my robot to clean living room”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my robot
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With a few words, the robot vacuum can clean your house with voice commands! 

Before using it, confirm that the speaker is bound to your Alexa account, the robot vacuum is bound to your Narwal account, and the robot vacuum is turned on. Last, tap “Enable TO USE” button on the top to complete the connection. 

You can use the following commands to control the robot vacuum. Supported voice commands include start/pause/resume/end cleaning, clean the room, charge, return to the base station, adjust the suction power, and check the robot location.

Start Cleaning
· Alexa, ask my robot to clean
· Alexa, ask my robot to clean with *"Snowball"
· Alexa, ask my robot to start cleaning
· Alexa, ask my robot to start cleaning with "Snowball"
· Alexa, ask my robot to vacuum
· Alexa, ask my robot to vacuum with "Snowball"
· Alexa, ask my robot to start vacuuming
· Alexa, ask my robot to start vacuuming with "Snowball"

Pause Cleaning
· Alexa, ask my robot to pause cleaning
· Alexa, ask my robot to pause cleaning with "Snowball"
· Alexa, ask my robot to pause
· Alexa, ask my robot to pause "Snowball"

Resume Cleaning
· Alexa, ask my robot to resume cleaning
· Alexa, ask my robot to resume cleaning with "Snowball"

End Cleaning
· Alexa, ask my robot to stop
· Alexa, ask my robot to stop "Snowball"
· Alexa, ask my robot to stop cleaning
· Alexa, ask my robot to stop cleaning with "Snowball"
· Alexa, ask my robot to stop vacuuming
· Alexa, ask my robot to stop vacuuming with "Snowball"

Charge
· Alexa, ask my robot to recharge
· Alexa, ask my robot to recharge with "Snowball"

Return to Base Station
· Alexa, ask my robot to return to the base station
· Alexa, ask my robot to return to the base station with "Snowball"

Clean Specified Room
· Alexa, ask my robot to clean *room A
· Alexa, ask my robot to vacuum *room A
· Alexa, ask my robot to vacuum *room A with "Snowball"
· Alexa, ask my robot to start cleaning *room A
· Alexa, ask my robot to start vacuuming *room A

Adjust Suction Power
· Alexa, ask my robot to change to quiet mode
· Alexa, ask my robot to change to normal mode
· Alexa, ask my robot to change to strong mode
· Alexa, ask my robot to change to super powerful mode
· Alexa, ask my robot to change to quiet mode with "Snowball"

Check Location
· Alexa, ask my robot to say where it is
· Alexa, ask my robot to say hi
· Alexa, ask my robot to say hi wtih "Snowball"
· Alexa, ask my robot to play sound to locate it

Note: 
1. *"Snowball" is the example device nickname. You can customize the nickname for your robot vacuum and use the new nickname to control the device. When managing multiple devices, it is recommended to use device nicknames to specifically control each robot vacuum. 
2. *room A is the example name. Room cleaning includes only: master bedroom, secondary bedroom, living room, kitchen, bathroom, toilet, balcony, dining room, closet, corridor, home office, kid's room, entertainment room, storage room. When using the room cleaning command, make sure to change the room names on the map to supported room names.
